title: Bone Sword
summaries: The Bone Sword is a melee weapon that has a 0.5*1/200 (0.5%) chance to drop from Skeletons and Spore Skeletons in the Cavern layer. While rare, it can be a useful weapon if obtained early in the game. Compared to other early-game swords, it swings slower and has slightly less knockback, but deals significantly more damage.

statistics.Damage: 19 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 16 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) (Melee)
statistics.Knockback: 5.5 (Average) (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 4.5 (Average) (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
